subtitles.text: Thank you for watching!
Here we go!
Hello! This time I'll be joined by Ruri Tamura of Juice Juice and Saori Onoda of Tsubaki Factory.
This time, we'll be presenting you with these two, so please stay with us until the end.
This week, the 17th is Saori Onoda's birthday, which means she will be 22 years old.
Yes, I am turning 22 years old, and I remember that a lot of things happened when I was 21 years old.
I am very good at staying positive and thinking positively every day, like, "Even if this happens, I will do my best next time.
By thinking positively, I have been able to live a very happy life, and I hope to enjoy my 22nd year in a positive way.
I am going to introduce you to the two of us, since we are the same age.
JuiceJuice recently celebrated the final concert of their tour at Nippon Budokan.
This year's concert tour is

We had been touring as part of the 10th anniversary concert tour, and at the time of Yuka Miyazaki's graduation concert Juiceful, we decided to perform all the songs from the past Juice Juice concerts,
We had a concert where we sang a lot of songs, some of them were replacements for others and some were medleys,
This Juice Story concert was the first time we sang a lot of songs from that tour, and we were allowed to do two medleys at the Budokan,
That's right. So I was happy to hear Juice Juice's many wonderful songs.
Tsubaki Factory held the tour final at Nippon Budokan in November, and it was the graduation performance of Riko Yamagishi and Yumeno Kishimoto,
Project, is it very rare for both of them to graduate at the same time?
Project is very rare to have both of them graduate at the same time, so I was very nervous, and I thought it would be a new challenge for their graduation,
I was both excited and anxious about how it would turn out, so I had a lot of emotions,
It was really fun, and the two of them looked so beautiful in their dresses,
I was happy that we were able to end the event on such a happy note, and I hope it will lead to future events,
I think we were able to end the Nippon Budokan concert in a way that will lead us to the future.
I think we were able to make it a Nippon Budokan performance that will lead to the future,
I think we were able to make it a Nippon Budokan performance that will lead to the future, and I am very happy that I was able to go and see it,
I was also able to go and see the concert,
Thank you very much.
It was a very happy space, and I felt very happy too.

Dambara Jul of Juice Juice and Saori Onoda of Tsubaki Factory present "Halo! Stay!
It's time to say goodbye.
Here's an announcement!
Juice Juice 10th Anniversary Concert Tour
Juice Juice at Budokan is now on sale on Blu-ray DVD!
Juice Juice has performed at Budokan 3 times this year.
This May's Budokan concert was the first one.
This is the first time in a long time that we have been able to perform at the Budokan.
It was also the first time in a while that we could hear many voices of Juice Juice family at the concert.
I hope you can see that moment.
Thank you very much for your cooperation.
And I will be performing with Janoma at the Cho-Idol Fest on December 21.
I will be performing with Janoma at the Cho-Idol Fest on December 21.
The live performances against other bands always give me a lot of inspiration.
Please do your best as Juice Juice!
We look forward to seeing you there!
Tsubaki Factory will perform at Idol Wave in Tokyo on December 29th.
Idol Wave In Tokyo on December 29th.
Tsubaki Factory is now a 9-member group.
We will do our best so that you can enjoy the current Tsubaki Factory to the fullest!
And on December 30th and 31st
Hello Project Year End Party 2023
Goodbye & Hello will be held!
December 31st will be held simultaneously in Tokyo and Osaka!
Oh, that's great!
Oh, wow!
So Juice Juice will perform in Osaka
Tsubaki Factory will be performing in Tokyo, so
Please join us in Osaka or Tokyo to enjoy the end of the year 2023!
And as for the New Year's Concerts
Hello Project 2024 Winter 3 of Us will start on January 2nd!
Tsubaki Factory will perform as Team A and Juice Chus as Team B!
We hope to have a great time with you at the Meiji concert.
We are looking forward to seeing you in 2024!
Haloste is a channel where Hello Project members will be appearing more and more!
New videos are uploaded every Wednesday, so please subscribe to the channel!
This time we're joined by Danbaralulu from Juice Chus and Saori Onoda from Tsubaki Factory!
Good bye!
